data.title: Gerus Oleh
data.meta_description: Millennium of Christianity in Ukraine, 988-1988 by Baran, Alexander; Gerus, Oleh W. and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Hard Cover. Condition: Very Good +. 2nd Printing. 876 pages plus index. Solid with minor wear on the covers and the interior is unmarked. Size: 8vo - over 7¾" - 9¾" tall.

Hard bound in blue cloth, second printing, published by the Homeniuk Publication Foundation (Canada). Pp873 + index. Tight and clean - a very good or better copy. Two copies available. 1.36 kilograms unpacked - depending on destination additional postage may be requested. We welcome all reasonable offers on our books. All books in stock and available for immediate shipment from Winnipeg, Manitoba.

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. No Jacket. Very good condition. Some underlining and margin marks are heaviest in the first few chapters. Spine tips are lightly bumped. A number of pages are creased at the top corner. 873 pages plus a seven page index. 29 illustrations and maps.

Softcover. First Edition, First Printing. pp. 379. 8vo. Illustrated laminated covers. Text in Ukrainian, and English. Bright, clean, and unmarked with firm, sound binding; fine. Scarce in commerce. Papers originally presented at Learned Societies conference held in Ottawa, Ont. - 1992, Victoria, B.C. - 1993 and Calgary, Alta. - 1994. Includes the following selections: Ukrainian-Canadian history as theatre / NIck Mitchell-Mychajluk; The use of Ukrainian names by three contemporary Canadian writers / Natalia Aponiuk; The perception of Ukrainian in Canadian and American geography text books / Paul F. Thomas; Towards a curriculum for teaching the geography of Ukraine / Paul F. Thomas.

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. No Jacket. Second Printing. 873 pages in very good condition. Pages are clean and unmarked, with a black and white frontispiece portrait of the author. Page edges are lightly darkened, marked, and smudged. Blue cloth with gilt titles on the front and spine. Lightly darkened and worn on the spine and around the edges. Lightly bumped on the corners. VG/- -.

Hardcover. Condition: Near Fine. First Edition. The book is near fine with slight edge wear and light bump to upper corners. Please note the Image in this listing is a stock photo and may not match the covers of the actual item.
